column2: Oh hi again! By the way, I'm Ada. I'm working on my new game here in the Clubhouse. It's called Fizzics. Want to see it?
Fab, Go ahead and launch Fizzics now.
See the Fizzics app on the desktop? Click on it now to start the game.
Bring up the Fizzics app. It's already running.

Fizzics helps me with my research on how things bounce, but frankly the slingshot is just really fun.

I can barely make levels fast enough for one of the students â€“ she's already on Level 10!
Okay, so first try to beat Level 1. Click around to check out how things work.
Click the orange ball to activate the slingshot. Pull back on it and then release it.
To win the level you have to fling all the orange balls against the goal.
Clearly you've got the idea! Okay, so one more level to go.
This works just like the others: get all the orange balls to the goal.
Whoa, I knew you'd catch on quickly! Here's a reward for your swift progress!
Oh, hey there! Quick work, Einstein!
Excellent progress so far! I'm going to give you a reward.
Your first key! This will come in handy later if you want to dig deeper into Fizzics.
OMG. Fizzics. I love this game. It's my total fave.

Oh, hey Riley! I hear you're already on Level 10!

See you back at the Clubhouse!
We can do it later. Come find me at the Clubhouse whenever!
